name: DFX Hugging Face Models Node
description: A node providing local execution of Hugging Face models as DroqFlow components.
author: Droq Team

MiniLMEmbeddingsComponent.description: Generate embeddings using the locally stored all-MiniLM-L6-V2 SentenceTransformer model.
MiniLMEmbeddingsComponent.author: Droq Team

DFXExportEmbeddingsDataComponent.description: Merge outputs from multiple embedding components into separate data and embedding streams.
DFXExportEmbeddingsDataComponent.author: Droq Team

LLMLinguaComponent.description: Compress text using LLMLingua-2 to reduce token count while preserving content quality.
LLMLinguaComponent.author: Droq Team
